name: Cops ’n’ Robbers Safecracker
description:
Play Cops 'n' Robbers for FREE!
Download now the most popular slot game from real casinos.
Tons of bonuses are already waiting for you!

This 5 reel, feature rich, multi-stake slot game is action-packed, with a unique chase feature and 3 progressive pots for BIG WINS!

•• Download now! 2,500 free credits on first install, 500 free credits to collect every four hours! ••

•• Daily free credits for telling your friends about this game! ••

•• 20 Pay-lines ••

•• Play from 25 credits up to 10,000 credits with a maximum line win of x500 ••

•• To win you need to have 3, 4 or 5 matching symbols adjacent on a win line. Win lines pay from the left to right only and wins can be paid on one, multiple or all win lines ••

•• ‘Wild’ symbols substitutes for any other symbol except for the ‘Safe’, ‘Robber’ and ‘Swag Bags’ bonus scatter symbols ••

•• An ‘Auto Play’ function is available which will auto spin until one of the 3 feature wins are awarded ••

•• ‘Chase’ Bonus
3 or more scatter ‘Robber’ symbols triggers the ‘Chase’ feature. Roll the dice to move around the board swiping points as you go and try to keep one step ahead of the law. Even when caught you get the chance to beat the I.D parade and continue your robbing quest ••

•• Swag Bag Progressive feature
The 3 swag bags above the reels increase with every spin. A Swag bag on reels 2, 3 and 4 will unlock the vault where the player will be prompted to choose one of the vaults to reveal a progressive win ••

•• Gamble Feature
The player can also select to gamble any wins they receive from the reels in a simple red/black turn of a card; a correct guess doubles the current win ••
